name: BreadWizard
description:
It's a sokoban like puzzle game in which you have to fill all the furnaces with bread.

Grzegorz "Czapa" Bednorz - Programming , Design, Graphics - https://github.com/Czapa10/

Jerzy Wujczyk - Music and Sound - mu_m@o2.pl

Controls:
AWSD - Movement
Num 1 - Cast bread spell
Num 2 - Cast roll spell
R - Reset level

Game was written from scratch in C/C++.
https://github.com/Czapa10/Bread-Wizard-nordic_game_jam_2020
